price: او هر څه چې د هغو كړه وړه دي موږ به هغه راواخلو د دوړې په څېر به يې والوځوو.
arabic: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqadim'nā ilā mā ʿamilū min ʿamalin fajaʿalnāhu habāan manthūran
